segments.text: I'm a bit fearful looking at this scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's water overflowing from the sink, and the woman doesn't even seem to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's just standing there, drying a plate like nothing is wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm worried she might slip on the wet floor and hurt herself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the children are being so sneaky, trying to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on that wobbly stool, reaching for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm scared he might fall and get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting there, ready to catch any cookies that come her way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't get into trouble when the woman finally notices what's happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like a disaster waiting to happen, and I can't help but feel worried.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want everyone to be safe and sound.
segments.speaker: PAR
